ModMetaData.name: ED-ReverseCycleCooler BetterCoolers
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Requires: Community Core Library, BetterCoolers, ED-PoweredVents
This module changes the cooler to have a rotate option; this allows you to switch it between cooling a room and using its output to warm the same room.
And uses the Graphics from BetterCoolers.
BetterVents: code and art by Latta - packaged by Skullywag
